He is the manager of a quarry in Orson and is known for his straight-forward, practical attitude, as well as his tendency to be emotionally a brick wall. But Mike does have a fun and softer side that he doesn't like to show.

Axl Heck is the mischievous, rebellious, athletic, lazy oldest child of Frankie and Mike, and the older brother of Sue and Brick.

Brick Heck is the youngest child of Frankie and Mike Heck, who loves to read and has quirks or habits of whispering to himself. This happens when certain words catch his ear and he wants to hear them again, quieter. (But when he's attempting to keep things on the down low, the volume changes the other way: he repeats words aloud.) He is exceptionally smart, but is easily tired, leading him to procrastinate or just forget his homework assignments and other projects.

12111.title: An Idea

121111.content:
The doorbell rang loudly. “Ah, that’ll be Nancy!” said Frankie, putting down the aerobics video she’d just looked at. Frankie opened the front door. “There you are, right on time!”

The two hefty Moms go and get changed. Both had changed into leotards for their workout. It was clear that both women had bought their work out clothes years ago when they had had much slimmer figures. “Gosh, I didn’t think I’d gotton so big” said Frankie, squirming slightly in her tight leotard, and placing her hands on her meaty backside.

“I know what you mean” said Nancy, staring down at her sagging tummy and bulging love handles, all prominently outlined by a leotard that was even more strained than Frankie’s. Frankie bent over to put the tape in the machine, displaying her enormous bum and thick thighs to the room. “Oomph” said Frankie, standing up, “that should start in a moment”. Nancy nodded, shifting slightly out of the way to give Frankie room as she walked back from the TV. Nancy’s big belly quivered as she moved, shaking flabbily with each tiny movement.

The TV burst into life as the video started to play. Loud, blaring music filled the room, and a sport young woman dressed in a sleek leotard that showed off her toned body leapt onto the screen. The girl sported a manic smile and blindingly white teeth, and almost at once started shouting enthusiastic advice to her televisual audience, whilst leaping madly around the screen. “Ok, girls, let’s hit the max burn with hi-five power!!!” she exclaimed, and promptly sprang into a series of energetic star jumps. Giggling slightly, and looking nervous, the two Moms tried to follow the hyper aerobics instructor. Throwing themselves into the air as far as they could manage, Frankie and Nancy started to do star jumps.

The floor shook with the impact of the heavy Moms, and their lycra-clad flesh wobbled madly. Frankie’s portly derriere was out of control, bouncing up and down with each movement. Nancy’s heavy belly wobbled erratically, threatening to throw her off balance. Puffing furiously, the unfit women did about five star jumps in the time it had taken the presenter to do twenty. But now the music had changed, and the brightly-smiling youth had started doing a whole new exercise. “Ok ladies, let’s do some step-up work! Feel the burn, yeah! Yeah, Yeah!” she shouted, pumping the air with her fists.

“Oh dear, we don’t have steppers” said Frankie.

“No.....*puff*....matter...*wheeze*...” gasped Nancy “we can just lift our legs in rhythm”. As the perky instructor bobbed up and down on her stepper, Nancy and Frankie lifted one leg up and then the other. Frankie found her chunky legs hard to hold up, they were so heavy. Nancy had thinner legs, but her big tummy kept getting in the way of her attempts to lift up her legs. As they wore out, the women took a brief break sweating heavily and breathing hard.

Intending to finish the whole tape, the two women in fact managed only a further ten minutes of exercise before they gave up. The energetic young aerobics presenter had introduced sit-ups as an exercise. Doing thirty in quick succession, her perky voice had shouted inane slogans and encouragements to her audience. But, try as they might, neither Nancy nor Frankie could manage to perform a single sit up. Nancy’s belly was just too big to let her struggle upright. Frankie had a much smaller tummy, but her abdominal muscles had long since turned to fat, and she was too out of shape to complete a sit-up.

After groaning and straining for the five minute exercise, Frankie said with a puff “Right, I think we should take a little break”. “Agreed!” said a relieved Nancy. Leaning on each other for support, the two well-fed women pulled themselves upright and walked into the kitchen. “I’m sure we’d both like a drink – what can I get you, Nancy? Water, juice, or an ice-cold soda?” asked Frankie, opening the door of the massive refrigerator. “Oooh, a soda sounds good!” said Nancy, who was glowing red. A big sweat-stain stood out on her leotard. Frankie bent over, leaning into the bottom of the fridge to get a big bottle of coke. As she did so, another few stitches snapped on the seat of her leotard, adding to the small hole forming in the over-stretched fabric. Plodding over to the other side of the kitchen, Frankie took down a couple of tall pint glasses from a shelf. She brimmed both glasses, draining the bottle of cola.

“Let’s sit down – take the weight off our feet” said Frankie, indicating the small chairs around the little kitchen table. Putting the towering glasses of coke on the table, Frankie moved over to the table and sat down with Nancy.

The two bulky Moms lowered their hefty bodies onto the tiny wooden chairs carefully, each self-conscious about the strain their hundreds of pounds would put on the fragile furniture. The chairs creaked and groaned under the load, but held firm. Sighing with relief at getting off her feet, Frankie said “I don’t know why we have these itty bitty chairs, really. I’m far too big for them, I’m afraid”. Frankie’s wide bottom hung far over the edge of the seat on both sides. She would need to use at least two of the narrow seats to support the full breadth of her broad bum. “Oh nonsense!” said Nancy, “You’re barely able to fill that chair as it is! Besides, we’ve both probably lost 10lbs in that workout!”. They both laughed, genuinely believing that their 40 minute attempt at exercise would have made up for years of slothful laziness and over-eating. “Yes, you’re probably right – I think I can feel my thighs toning up already!” said Frankie, imagining herself as the sleek athletic girl she had been back in her teens. “Well I’m sure that after a whole afternoon of working out, I’ll have lost at least an inch from my waistline!”, said Nancy. “Oh, almost undoubtedly – if not more than an inch. I actually think you look a little slimmer already, no kidding” said Frankie in a serious voice. “I know”, she said in a mischievous tone, “we should both have a little treat for working so hard! How would you like a slice of the triple-chocolate cake I’ve made for the school’s bake sale? I can always bake another” she said. “Oh yes! We deserve it! Got to keep our strength up, and there’s no point doing exercise if you can’t indulge a little bit afterwards” said Nancy eagerly.

Getting up from the table, Frankie walked over to the refrigerator again, her meaty thighs rubbing together and giving her a pronounced waddle. Opening the fridge, she pulled out an enormous cake on a plate. It was a rich brown color, with thick chocolate icing dripping from the top and a deep layer of mouth-watering chocolate cream in the middle. Placing it on the table, Frankie got plates and knives, and sat back down on the chair, which made further protests as the obese woman wiggled her heavy rump around to get comfortable. “Here, let me cut you a slice”, said Frankie, wielding the knife and cutting an enormous slice of cake for Nancy. “Mmm, thanks, it looks delicious!” said Nancy. Frankie cut herself a similar sized piece, and both women took dainty little bites from their slices, not wanting to appear greedy in front of the other. “Wow, that’s great! So moist and rich!” exclaimed Nancy, and she took a bigger second bite. “Why thank you! I can easily give you the recipe” said Frankie, flushed with pride. “Mmmmmm, you must! This is divine!” said Nancy, swallowing another large mouthful. Soon, both had finished their slices. “More?” inquired Frankie, pointing the knife at the cake. “I shouldn’t....” said Nancy, sheepishly, “oh, but go on! Just one more slice won’t hurt!”. “That’s the spirit!”, said Frankie, cutting another two large slices. Taking deep draughts of their soda, the women washed down mouthful after mouthful of chocolate cake. All the while, they chatted about their weight problems, comforting one another and reassuring themselves that there was no fair reason that they had both gained so much weight. “I eat SO carefully” said Frankie, cutting herself another slice of cake, “but I just can’t seem to keep the pounds off. I have no idea why”. “Oh I know what you mean”, sympathised Nancy as she refilled her glass with cola, “I just get heavier and heavier each year, and no one can explain why!” “It is a mystery, isn’t it?” mumbled Frankie through a mouthful of cake. “Say, you know what goes great with my chocolate cake? My home-baked Apple Pie! I just made one yesterday, you’ve got to try it! Let me go get it!” exclaimed Frankie, standing up. “What a good idea! If it’s as great as this cake, i’ll need the recipe for the pie too!” replied Nancy cheerfully. Plopping the pie tin down next to the cake, Frankie sat back down. Munching away on cake and pie, the two women continued to chat enthusiastically about their high hopes for weight loss now that they were exercising together.
121111.title: “Work Out”

1211111.content:
Frankie and Nancy had met twice that week to exercise and they faithfully struggled through the dreaded tape each time, but afterwards the amount of food they shared more than cancelled out their efforts.

Today, however, Nancy made the excuse of a sore knee and Frankie was all too happy to accept it as legit to get out of exercising. After all, they had both been working so hard, didn't they deserve a break? It was Frankie who had offered to meet them at Greasy Burger.

Greasy Burger was a fast food restaurant known best for its extremely unhealthy food.

When Nancy got there, Frankie already had one of the tables around the huge jungle gym.

“Such a shame we can’t work out today – I’m so sorry that this knee of mine prevents me,” apologized Nancy. “Don’t worry – it’s nice to get a break sometimes,” said Frankie, secretly glad to get out of aerobics for a week. Although both women had indeed been meeting regularly to workout, they had continued to steadily gain weight throughout. Since they snacked together so heavily after their aerobics sessions, they cancelled out all their efforts to lose weight. Bulging out of their outfits, both house moms looked positively porcine as they munched away at some giant triple deck burgers they’d ordered for themselves. Frankie’s big bum bulged far out over the edge of the wooden chair she was sitting on. Nancy continued to add inches to her massive belly, and her heavy tummy reached out far over her lap. Both of them together were a veritable portrait for the obesity epidemic. Guzzling their way through thousands of calories-worth of food, the quartet was quite oblivious to their expanding waist-lines. Frankie and Nancy were both in a state of denial about their seemingly unstoppable weight gain.

Chatting away, Frankie and Nancy wondered what to do with the afternoon. Normally they’d have been happy to get some more snacks and go to their respective homes and spend the day watching TV and lazing around. But Frankie, who felt a little adventurous, suggested something quite unusual. “I know, let’s go to the park! There’s a nice walk to the top of the hill overlooking the town – it’d be a great thing to do on such a nice day!” Nancy wasn’t so sure about the walk. “Sounds like a plan, Frankie, let’s get some desserts here and then drive on. A gentle walk is just the kind of exercise that will help us slim down!” said Nancy as she ordered a triple chocolate fudge cake with whipped cream and hot chocolate sauce.
1211111.title: Greasy Burger

12111111.content:
After finishing dessert at Greasy Burger the quartet was ready to set off.

Arriving a little later at the park the sun was shining brightly and the day looked perfect. The park was busy, and all around families were enjoying the nice weather. Folks were having picnics and playing sports. Two trim women dressed in lycra jogged past, clearly keeping their bodies in excellent shape through exercise. Frankie and Nancy sat on a park bench after a short walk, feeling a little winded. “Wow, what a great day!” said Nancy, sounding surprised. Nancy wasn’t very keen on the outdoors, and spent most everyday indoors. Frankie was quite different and liked being outside. Back in her younger days, Frankie had been a keen hiker and had done a little bit of mountain climbing whilst in college. “There’s the hill,” said Frankie, pointing at a gentle rise ahead of them, “you get a great view over the town from the top. Let’s get going!”

At the top of the hill Frankie and Nancy were chatting on the bench. They were eating hot dogs. They also had cups of ice cold soda. They ate and drank for a little while. Then an ice cream cart came up.

"Ice cream?" Frankie asked.

"Oh, why not?" Nancy smiled.

They got up and requested large ice creams. They were given jumbo sundaes. They paid the lady behind the cart and went to sit down on the bench again. They immediately began eating the ice cream, cramming it down their throats with much haste. Frankie's rear began to stretch outwards over the edge of the bench, and Nancy's stomach was beginning to stretch forwards even more. They ate and ate, oblivious to this. Soon the bowls were empty and they tossed them in the trashcan next to them.

Next a cart selling giant hot pretzels came up. Frankie and Nancy immediately bought a few of them, and they sat on the bench, stuffing the pretzels into their mouths, washing them down with fresh sodas. They were enjoying it so much they failed to notice they were still stretching their bodies outwards and forwards. They were laughing and talking and stuffing and gorging.

Then a cart selling pizza slices. It brought out the inner pigs in the two moms. They both bought four slices and two more sodas. They sat at the bench and slide the slices into their mouths, still swapping stories between bites and through mouthfuls of cheese and bread. It seemed as though they were unaware of how large they were growing. They were consuming thousands of calories with each swallow.

Soon, all the paper plates and cups were in the nearby trashcan, which was now filled to the brim. It was not unlike Frankie and Nancy, who were both leaning back on the bench. Frankie's rear and hips were a bit more spread, and she was clutching her also growing belly. Nancy was leaning back and with both hands placed on top of her potbelly, which stretched out ahead of her.

Just then, the ice cream cart came by again. Frankie looked up.

"Ice cream?" she asked.

Holding down a burp, Nancy looked up.

"Again? Sure!"

They both struggled to their feet and ordered more ice cream, asking for it to be piled on high. Once that was paid for, they carried their ice cream back to the bench. Forgetting to use their spoons, they dove in face-first, swallowing the ice cream whole as it slid down their throats. Eating, slurping, munching, licking, gorging, stuffing... You know, taking on food, pretty much.

Soon, they were placing the bowls in the trash can. They leaned back again. They were GLAD they weren't exercising today.

"What a *beautiful* day!" Nancy groaned, licking her lips.

"It is, isn't it?" Frankie sighed, wiping her face with a napkin.

"Do you want to get dinner now?" Nancy asked.

Frankie smiled at the idea. "Sure, let's go."

Frankie and Nancy heaved themselves off the bench. They both waddled with ease down the hill. The moms were trying to keep back hiccups and burps as they struggled to digest their indulgent. Finally, they reached the car.

Frankie found her seat a little tight around the rear, so she adjusted the seat a little and buckled up. Nancy sat in the passenger's side and attempted to buckle up, but her bulging potbelly blocked the seat belt from reaching its proper place. She had to back the seat up and lean back a little to finally buckle up.

"Why do you suppose we can't lose weight?" Frankie wondered.

"It's a mystery to me," Nancy replied, unbuttoning her pants.

They drove out of the park.

They might just have both stuffed themselves full of a week’s worth of calories, but Frankie and Nancy were still feeling hungry enough to want to gorge themselves even more. Rolling out of the park in the car, Frankie rubbed her flabby belly and wondered where they should go to get dinner. “What d’you think you’d like to eat, Nancy,” asked Frankie, “I think I could go from some more burgers and cheese fries, how’d you feel about that?” “Mmmmm, sounds delicious, I liked those burgers at lunch, but we had so few I didn’t really get to satisfy my appetite!” replied Nancy, licking her plump lips in anticipation. “Right, back to Greasy Burger!” said Frankie, pulling out onto the highway.
12111111.title: Eating at The Park

121111111.content:
Driving to the restaurant, Frankie and Nancy chatted about how much fun they were having today. “You know, Nancy, I’m actually glad you weren’t able to do aerobics today. It’s been great to get a break and spoil ourselves just a little. Too much dieting and exercise can get boring!” said Frankie. “I know what you mean – I feel like we totally deserve a break from our fitness regime. We’ve been so good that we owe ourselves a timeout from starving ourselves” agreed Nancy. Giggling about how “good” they’d been, the two Mom’s didn’t seem to remember that neither of them had ever got around to going on a diet at all, and in fact each of them had been eating steadily more since they’d started trying to work out together. Any outside observer would also have found it odd that Frankie and Nancy didn’t seem to think it bad that in fact they were still both piling on the pounds in spite of their so-called fitness regime. Each time they met to work out the tubby duo would weigh themselves and remark on how happy they were to have “only” put on a little more since last week. Congratulating themselves on their imaginary self-discipline, the moms had already forgotten their gluttonous binge in the park.

Arriving at the Greasy Burger, Frankie and Nancy were already salivating at the thought of indulging themselves with every fatty treat they could eat. “After all,” as Frankie had said, “we should have a little splurge now and again to enjoy ourselves!” Nancy couldn’t agree more, and she struggled to do up her pants before getting out of the car. Her belly had grown quite a bit after the enormous over-feeding it had received in the park, but Nancy was just about able to get the button to close. Fortunately for Frankie, her extra poundage was going increasingly onto her rump and thighs, and her clothes were able to take the strain of her expanding figure – at least for the moment. Waddling towards the door of the Greasy Burger, Frankie felt that her thighs were chafing more than before, and her broad hips wriggled in exaggerated motions. ‘Hmm, I’ll have to park closer to the entrance next time’ thought Frankie as she paused to rearrange her pants in an effort to ease the rubbing of her meaty legs.

Getting inside, the waitress who’d served them at lunch recognised the obese duo. Putting on a big smile and sashaying over to where they were standing, the chirpy teen directed the full glare of her lip gloss on Frankie and Nancy as she said “Hi Guys – you folks coming back for more today? It’s great to see y’all again so soon! Let me show you to a table and get some menus for you guys!” The slim teen had a trim figure in stark contrast to most of the patrons of the Greasy Burger – clearly she didn’t eat much of the restaurant’s produce herself. As the waitress led on, Frankie could see that Nancy was probably three times the weight of the skinny girl. The Greasy Burger clearly understood what its customers wanted, and the large, armless chairs were a godsend for a woman of Frankie’s proportions.

“Let’s just go nuts, shall we?” asked Frankie, grinning at Nancy and patting her big tummy. “Yeah – I really feel like indulging myself tonight!” replied Nancy, undoing her pants button again and smiling conspiratorially at Frankie. When the slender waitress came back, Frankie ran off a huge order – naming nearly every item on the menu. Although she was used to seeing porkers overeat here, the waitress whistled in amazement at the size of this order. “Woah, you guys must really be hungry today!” she said once Frankie finally finished their order. “Yes, we’re celebrating making so much progress on our diet and exercise regime – we thought we’d spoil ourselves for a change!” said Nancy. “Good for you!” said the waitress, trying to hide her amusement.

Soon, their giant order was arriving. Piling up the dishes on the table, the waitress was amazed at how fast the food was vanishing into the gullets of the bloated duo.

Their stomachs stretched out by their afternoon binge in the park, the two Moms had powerful appetites. Since they’d decided to really enjoy themselves, neither woman felt any need to restrain her greed for food. Usually Frankie would have felt bad about overeating quite so much, but since Nancy was with her she felt no guilt at all. Chomping and guzzling down an appetizer bucket of nachos meant for a family of four, Frankie poured the cheesy chips into her mouth as fast as she could, licking the sour cream and guacamole off her plump fingers with relish. “Sooooo good!” she muttered blissfully, closing her eyes and delighting in the sensation as she swallowed each mouthful. Although her belly was not nearly as big as Nancy’s, Frankie still felt the need to undo her pants to give herself more room. As they feasted on the mountain of food, Frankie and Nancy kept on calling the waitress over to order more and more to keep their table fully stacked with dishes. As Nancy finished off her fourth triple-deck burger, she drained a whole 16oz soda to wash it down, burping happily as she slurped up the last of the calorific beverage. Both women were enjoying themselves more than they could ever have imagined. They were both used to overeating and filling themselves up, but that was normally at home. Here there was a special kind of bliss, since they were really going for broke and eating everything they wanted to excess, without feeling the least bit of guilt. Eating in each other’s company was just amazing, and the effect of their happiness massively increased their already immense appetites.

By the time she’d eaten her way through yet another basket of cheese fries, Nancy’s vast belly had swollen up tremendously. Consumed by her gluttony, Nancy was practically oblivious to how big she was getting. But the other diners could almost see both women growing steadily fatter before their very eyes. The amazing consumption of food by Frankie and Nancy was having a surprising effect on the other patrons. Many of the other Moms and parents started doing the same. Across the other side of the restaurant, an obese mom was ordering dinner for herself and her two very fat daughters. She was about to order only one burger for herself, but after seeing Frankie inhale three burgers in short order, she said “Dammit, I’m going to have four burgers tonight – I shouldn’t have to deny myself!” Just next to Nancy, a slightly plump woman decided to copy Nancy’s order for two platters of surf-n-turf, inspired by seeing Nancy’s rapturous expression as she chomped the first one down.

In the kitchen of the Greasy Burger, the staff was working at full-speed to keep up with the orders. “Geez! What’s happening out there? Did a whole football team come in or something?!” shouted the head chef. “No. It’s amazing, everyone just started ordering more and more food!” yelled one of the waitresses as she collected yet another tray loaded with super-sized dishes. “Well let’s hope it keeps going! We’re making double our money tonight!” said the manager, helping out in the kitchen to keep the food coming. Sure enough, the effect continued. Before long, everyone in the restaurant was ordering seconds, then thirds and then extra fries with that. Everywhere you looked you could see kids and parents chomping on gigantic burgers, shovelling down fries, and slurping up endless sodas before ordering yet more food. Bellies bulged, belts were loosened, pants were unbuttoned and shirts drew taut over swelling waistlines. Kids of all ages chewed and guzzled to their hearts’ content, adding pounds to their already flabby bodies. Obese moms forgot their diets and ate like they were skinny again, gulping down the calories and fat without a care.

But all the time it was Frankie and Nancy who were eating more than anyone else. After stuffing themselves to the point of near immobility, they were all just about ready to start ordering some desserts. Frankie had never been so full in all her life – her stomach was drum-tight and swelled out far over her enormous thighs, covering up much of her lap. Massaging her paunch, Frankie’s mouth watered as she thought of all the delicious desserts she’d eat soon. “How’s it going, Frankie?” asked Nancy, patting her own much bigger belly and giving a little burp. “You ready from some dessert?” “Sure am, Nancy!” Nancy waved at the waitress to get her attention. The dazed girl came over – she had been stunned by what she’d seen tonight. Never before had she seen so many people eat so much. As she looked at Nancy, she could see that her tummy had blown up like a balloon since lunchtime. Even more amazingly, Frankie’s already generous backside seemed to have expanded quite a lot over the day, and her globular derriere was hanging far over the edges of her seat. In fact, Frankie would have asked for an extra chair to support her broad bottom, but she was so stuffed that she doubted she could stand up to reseat herself. Nancy ordered almost every dessert on the menu for herself. Frankie followed suite but asked for another burger to be served with her desserts, since she liked them so much. The waitress was about to go when Nancy asked “Can we see the specials?” “Sure” said the waitress. “What’s the Ice Cream Mega Trough?” asked Nancy, scanning the specials list. “That’s our super-special dessert”, answered the waitress “it’s a giant trough filled with every flavor of ice cream we have, covered in whipped cream and hot fudge sauce and topped with sprinkles and chocolate chunks – it serves a family of four”. “Great, I’ll have one of those!” said Nancy, hefting her belly in both hands and smacking her lips. “Me too!” said Frankie. Gasping in amazement and horror, the waitress took the order and hurried away before the huge women could order even more food to fill their bottomless tummies.
121111111.title: Burgers

choices: Frankie Decides To Have A Little Snack Before Going To Bed
1211111111.content:
The crotch of Frankie's pants had been a problem since she sat down. It was tight down there and the layers of fat, heavy meat were tugging in all directions across her crotch through to her inner thighs. In fact, the entire crotch area of her pants was filled with her lower stomach fat, she wore her pants over her stomach and so when she sat her lower belly fat completely covered her crotch and most of her thighs. The strain was hard to ignore, especially with her lower stomach pushing out farther and harder with each bite consumed. Her thighs smacked like waves crashing with eat heaving bite, Frankie was a pig. A fat consuming machine. Each roll, each fat slab that populated her body was growing, thickening with no end in site.

Even though they had both undone their pants, Frankie and Nancy were feeling uncomfortably constrained by their tight clothes. Squirming in her seat to get more comfortable, Frankie shifted her vast bulk, sending ripples through her jello-like flesh and causing a few stitches to burst along the seams of her pants. “Ooof, I think I need to go up a size or two!” said Frankie, listening to her strained pants creaking and groaning. “Tell me about it” replied Nancy, undoing the buttons of her shirt that were stretched to bursting-point across her belly. Letting the soft flesh ooze out, Nancy breathed a happy sigh of relief as the pressure was eased.

Anyone passing by would have worn a look of astonishment but the two proud woman thought nothing of it, they disrobed, button after button, as if growing out of clothes was a course in a meal.

Bloated and swollen though they were, Frankie and Nancy finally scaled the height of gluttony with their desserts. Nancy and Frankie, forgetting all about good manners, buried their fat faces into the enormous family-sized troughs of ice cream they had ordered for themselves. Eating like pigs, the two women stuffed and gorged themselves to the point of extreme overindulgence, revelling in their gluttonous excess. The ice cream was served in a truly massive container, shaped like a trough for feeding animals. Burying their faces in the calorific super bomb, Nancy and Frankie scaled new heights of ecstasy as they consumed the final part of their tremendous feast. Fudge sauce dripped from Frankie’s plump chin, dribbling down her double chin and plopping onto her bulging bosom. “Deeeelicious!” she said, breathing heavily and belching. Soon, Nancy had finished too. Clutching her vast, orb-like paunch in both hands, she smiled broadly at Frankie and giggled. “Woah, that was FUN!”

It was more than a hour before the duo was ready to leave. Frankie and Nancy were far too full to even think of moving. Fortunately, the manager had realised that the massive boost to business that evening was entirely because of the example being set by the two obese women. Serving them some coffee whilst the two ridiculously overfed women regained some of their strength and eased their digestion, he was happy to wait until they were quite ready to leave. Once Frankie finally managed to stagger unsteadily to her feet, swaying dangerously as she got used to her new center of gravity, several of the restaurant staff rushed over to help. “Omph...thank you!” said Frankie as the skinny waitress supported her on one side whilst the manager propped her up on the other. A couple of chefs performed the same service for Nancy, who was finding it very hard to get up under her own steam. Finally, with a further help from the Greasy Burger staff, the stuffed two were able to get into their car. The bill was enormous, but the manager insisted that they only pay half the total cost, since they’d generated so much extra business among the other patrons. “You all come back real soon now!” he said, waving as Frankie started up the engine.

Nancy was totally unable to get the seatbelt over her belly this time. No matter what Frankie did, she couldn’t get her butt comfortable in her seat, and her hips brushed painfully against the door and the air con control panel located between the driver's seat and the passenger side. “Well, we really had a great time, didn’t we!” said Frankie, feeling deliciously warm and full from her colossal meal. “Mmmmm, sure did!” replied Nancy, massaging her fully exposed belly gently to ease her digestion. They were all too full to talk, and Frankie drove Nancy back to her house. Nancy had recovered enough to waddle slowly and ponderously without assistance. “That was great, Frankie – what an amazing day!” “Yeah, let’s meet for aerobics next week – hopefully your ankle will be better by then and we can get back to losing more weight!” said Frankie. “Sure thing –see you in a week!” said Nancy cheerfully.

Driving home, Frankie wondered casually how long it would be until her exercise regime would start to take effect and her weight would start coming down. “Oh well, no hurry. The main thing is that I’m trying so hard and being so good!” thought Frankie. “It’ll be good to see Nancy again next week – we have such fun together. But for now, I’ll be glad to get home and go to sleep. Gosh, I’m so full! But it was all so delicious! Maybe we should have more little treats like that in the future!”
1211111111.title: Just Desserts

12111111111.content:
Frankie, suddenly filled with greed and gluttony, drove towards the gas station.

"Oh, I need gas anyway," she thought to herself.

Frankie struggled out of the car and scurried over towards the 24-Hour store. She waddled through the double-glass-doors and looked around. The place was empty, aside from the cashier. Knowing she was low on funds, she quickly used the nearby ATM and started to scope the place out.

Frankie quickly started loading things into a small cart. She got chocolate donuts, powdered mini-doughnuts, Chips Ahoy, Reese's Pieces, Crunch, Hershey's Bar, and about four Ice Cream Sandwiches. Then she bought about three bottles of Pepsi.

"I've been a good girl lately," she thought to herself. "This won't hurt."

She brought them all to the cashier.

"This all for you?" he asked.

"Oh, I'm bringing some for my family in the car," she said absently, putting them all down on the counter.

In minutes, the cashier rang them all up, and Frankie scurried back to the car. After she managed to squeeze herself back into her seat, she immediately tucked in. She ripped open all her packages and started to munch on junk food and sweets and such. She crammed the ice cream sandwiches into her mouth and swallowed them, managing to avoid brain freeze. She crammed the chocolate bars into her body, and then gorged on each doughnut, smearing chocolate, powder and sprinkles all over her face. Then she downed all the Pepsies as quickly as she could manage. She could feel the car seat getting tighter, and her clothes were beginning to get uncomfortable around her now stuffed gullet.

Finally, her gluttony quenched, Frankie leaned back in her seat and pat her belly, which seemed to have caught up with her rear. Finally feeling full and satisfied, she started the car up and drove home.

When she got there, she struggled out of the tiny compartment that was her driver's seat.

She left the car and went to bed.
12111111111.title: Gas Station Gorge

choices: Frankie Comments on the Size of Nancy's Belly
121111111111.content:
Frankie and Nancy dutifully met up to work out together in Frankie’s basement gym one week later. However, Nancy had called ahead to say that her knee still felt quite sore, and she didn’t want to risk hurting it by doing any exercise just yet. “That’s fine, Nancy! We don’t want you to strain your knee just as it is getting better”, Frankie had said, trying to hide her satisfaction at having an excuse to get out of doing aerobics for another week. So instead of putting on their leotards, the two flabby house moms put on some nice (but tight-fitting) outfits and went out to treat themselves to another enormous feast at the Greasy Burger. As before, they ate until they could barely move, and left the restaurant supported by the staff who helped them heave their bloated bodies into their car. And like last time Nancy and Frankie agreed to work out together the following week.

But when the next week came, Nancy was still concerned about her knee, and once again they went out to spoil themselves. This time, Nancy suggested going to the food court at the mall for lunch. They sampled dishes from all of the different stands, eating fajitas, southern fried chicken, pizza and burgers until they were full up.

Come the third week since their last “work-out”, Nancy said she felt she’d probably be OK, but wanted to give it one more week of rest just to be sure that her knee was fully recovered. “That’s a great idea, Nancy! We don’t want to rush back into exercise before you’re completely recovered” said Frankie, chewing on a jumbo cookie and holding a bear claw in her other hand. Instead, they agreed to go clothes shopping together, since both of them had noticed that very few of their outfits were still comfortable. After stopping off for an enormous lunch at McDonalds, the two of them spent the afternoon in the mall, going from store to store looking for clothes that would fit. Between each store, Frankie or Nancy would buy snacks from the cookie store, or krispy kreme, or the food court to help keep their strength up.

Although they both grazed happily on the sugary snacks, Frankie and Nancy had each been shocked by how many sizes up they’d had to go to get clothes that fit them. Frankie had found it nearly impossible to get pants to fit her colossal backside, and was shocked when a store clerk measured her hips and reported that they were a whopping 64” around. Fortunately, a plus-size store was able to provide Frankie with a whole range of pants that were specially designed to fit the biggest of derrieres. Nancy had also gasped when her waist size turned out to be 52”. She’d been sucking in her gut as hard as she could at the time the skinny store clerk had taken her measurement, so she dreaded to think what the true figure was. Up until now, Frankie and Nancy had been somehow oblivious to the effects of their guzzling and gorging. But they each felt rather self-conscious as they waddled through the mall munching on a box of Danish pastries. “Woah, guess we’d better make sure and work out next week!” said Nancy, catching sight of her reflection in the shiny glass of a store front. “Yeah, I think so” muttered Frankie, noting how uncomfortable she felt as her thunder thighs rolled over one another as she walked. “Still, let’s stop off at that Chinese place on the way back – I’m starving” said Nancy, licking her plump lips greedily. “Sure – we deserve one last treat before we get back on track with our exercise regime!” said Frankie, smiling at the thought of topping up her stomach once more.

At last, after a month’s break, Frankie and Nancy met up to restart their workout sessions. After they’d parted last week, the two moms had promised each other that start their diets the moment they finished their blow-out meal at the all-you-can-eat Chinese restaurant. As she waited for Nancy, Frankie felt nervous since she’d not really started her diet at all. In fact, even though she’d tried to restrain herself, Frankie couldn’t control her cravings to snack, and she munched her way through the days like never before. When the doorbell rang, and Frankie went to the door, she felt sheepish about admitting to Nancy that she’d broken their promise. But when she opened the door, it was clear that Nancy hadn’t exactly managed to stick to her pledge to stop snacking either. She was half-way through a Hershey bar as she stood on the porch in front of her. “Nancy! Good to see you! But what’s that in your hands!?” tutted Frankie, smiling with relief that she wasn’t the only one who couldn’t resist chocolate. “Oh I know, I know!” said Nancy, “it looked sooooo good that I had to have one!” “It’s ok, I haven’t exactly been completely strict about my diet either” said Frankie with a cheeky grin, “come on inside!” Nancy waddled heavily through the door, Nancy’s prominent belly brushing against Frankie’s voluminous hips as she squeezed past her.

Nancy and Frankie were both wearing their workout leotards, which had clearly been designed to cover smaller figures than those possessed by either woman. The stretchy material clung to every roll, fold and bulge on their bloated bodies. Since they’d really started to overindulge, neither Frankie nor Nancy had seen each other in such revealing outfits. Frankie was surprised to see just how big Nancy’s belly was becoming. It bulged out far in front of her, and was beginning to form into two layers of fat, with a shelf of flab forming an upper belly running over as a fold of fat at Nancy’s naval. Frankie could also see that Nancy’s love handles had taken a fair share of her increased poundage, making a thick tire of fat around her middle. Frankie was going to say something, but noticed that Nancy was looking just as surprised as she took in Frankie’s appearance.
121111111111.title: Wait Out the Work Out

choices: Frankie and Nancy struggle to get up.
1211111111111.content:
"Er, Nancy, I hope you don't take this the wrong way, but you're really getting big around the belly," Frankie said unsurely.

Nancy looked down at her belly. It stretched so far ahead and was so big around she couldn't even see her own feet. She sighed.

"Yeah, I guess we haven't exactly been keeping up with our dieting as well as we thought," she admitted.

Frankie nodded sheepishly. "We really need to start working out again," she decided.

They struggled hard to do sit-ups, but they couldn't bend past their bellies, which when squeezed, they grew larger, and caused their guts nearly ripped out of the leotards. Deciding not risk it, they immediately stopped, and waited until the next routine that wouldn't involved bending. In other words, they spent a full twenty-five minutes lying on their backs, talking while their stomachs stuck straight up in the air.

Finally, it came to jumping-jacks. They reluctantly got to their feet and tried to keep up with the instructor. But as they jumped, the furniture shook and rattled. Pictures fell to the floor. A recliner tipped over.

"Let's stop this!" Frankie gasped.

Nancy merely panted for air in response.

They both stopped, bent over and gasping and panting. They both knew they weren't going to get all the way though this work out alive.

Frankie promptly switched the tape off and went into the living room. Frankie had a tray laden with food! It looked like perhaps Frankie had planned this in advance, as there seemed to be fast food upon the tray as well as offerings from her cupboard and fridge. The tray and its contents came into clear view and a rumble let loose from Nancy's stomach. Her eyes lit up greedily as she stared at a mountain of burgers, fries, pretzels, chips, candies, chocolates, cake, and two huge frosty root beers!

Frankie and Nancy sat back on the couch and spread the food out on the table in front of them. They leaned in and immediately both grabbed two big juicy cheeseburgers that were dripping grease and loaded with four different cheeses. They had devoured them in minutes.

They the two bags of chips, practically pouring the contents of the bags into their mouths. This was followed by a cascade of pretzels and fries that slithered their way into their mouths.

Everytime either one started to feel full, they'd glance at the TV and see the cooking shows. They'd get hungry just looking at them, and then they'd go back in with more gusto.

They took a knife, cut the cake in half, and put both halves on plates. They didn't even use forks. They just buried their faces in the chocolate icing and devoured them. Ten minutes later, they were grinning dopily at each other, faces smeared with chocolate.

Frankie then got down on the floor and took her giant root beer. Nancy took her's and spread out on the couch. They both leaned back, opened their mouths and slurped away.

An hour later...

Now both were on the floor, leaning against the couch. They'd pushed the table out of the way and were both now eating candies and chocolates from a giant bowl. They spoke casually between each other, slowly but surely losing their grip with reality. They were in a strange area between sugar rush and energy crash, so it was hard to say how they were.

They'd eat and jiggle and pat their bellies, giggling dopily, almost drunk from the sugar and salt, bloating more and more.
1211111111111.title: Failed Work Out

choices: They give up trying to lose weight
12111111111111.content:
They all spent a lot of time there. They just lay on their backs for about an hour and a half. Frankie and Nancy were trying to get their strength back.

Finally, however, it was getting late. It was almost 6:00.

"Well," Nancy said at last. "I think we need to get going. This was...interesting."

"Sure," said Frankie. "I'd show you to the door, but I'm not sure I remember where the door is."

Groaning and gurgling, Nancy rolled and shifted until she was finally off her back and onto her rear. She winced at the sound of the stitches in her elastic clothes snapping and tearing, but it didn't rip yet.

She whimpered slightly. Her stomach was so stuffed and overfilled that she could just barely keep herself from letting out a full out moan. Writhing and struggling, Nancy was just able to get up onto her feet, but she was in squat, which resulting in more seams bursting.

Frankie watched, one hand still on her stomach.

Nancy now found that straightening her legs out and lifting to her full height would be a real task. Struggling and wincing, she started to go up.

Nancy, in squatting position, lost her balance thanks to her new girth, and she ended up tumbling forward onto her belly.

WHUMP!

Landing on her full stomach, she groaned slightly. Her rear end and back fat jiggled and moved around.

Frankie managed to speak, but the way she said it, it was almost a grunt.

"Are you okay?" she called.

"Oof... Ooh...," moaned Nancy. "I...hic...I think so...."

Deciding to give in, Nancy dragged herself across the floor, pushing against the floor with her feet and clawing herself ahead.

Frankie poked her bulging stomach, feeling too stuffed and bloated to know what she did. She decided to follow in suit. Rolling, struggling, moaning and complaining, Frankie managed to struggle until she too was in a similar position and dragging herself across the kitchen towards the living room. Her full stomach was gurgling and sloshing as it rubbed against the floor.

She reached her destination at the sofa. Pausing for a few minutes to catch her breath, Frankie reached up and grabbed the side of the couch, and with all her might, she managed to get push herself up and onto her feet.

By now, Nancy had arrived, and now that she was standing up, Frankie was able to help her onto her feet.

Both woman stood there, gasping for breath and leaning against the sofa. There was a long pause that was only interrupted by Nancy suddenly letting a giant, "BBBRRRRAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAPP!!" Followed by this, the stitching on her leotard finally gave way, ripping entirely and allowing her stomach to slide out. This was followed by yet another awkward pause, as Nancy stared at her stomach and Frankie tried not to.

Finally, Nancy let out a resigned, "What's the point?"

Her belly had always been pretty big but the last 100 pounds had all settled into her belly and now it was sticking out further then when she was pregnant and hung low enough to hide her panties. While she loved the look, but she either had to let her belly hang out or wear maternity dresses.
She wasn't moving very quickly. She waddled up the ramp to the Heck's front door. She was very glad Mike put in the ramp so Frankie wouldn't have to struggle up the stairs. This walk seemed to take longer every time she made it.
She waddled up to the door and rang the doorbell. They were planning on tanning. Frankie answered the door in her bikini.

As they got out to the pool she spotted Sue, Axl and Brick by the side of the pool. Nancy and Frankie pig out in private
12111111111111111121.content:
"To be honest, I've just been eating like crazy, every opportunity I get, even when you're not around."

Nancy thought about this for a moment. It's not like she ever let herself go hungry--if her tummy rumbled, she happily fed it--but was she really stuffing herself when Frankie wasn't around? I suppose not... but why? Then it clicked with her. Her twins, Dotty and Shelly. With Frankie, she could focus single-mindedly on making a pig of herself, but when she was alone with the twins, all of her energy was focused on keeping his own growing belly happy, leaving much less time for Nancy to fill her own. But wait, Brick wasn't exactly showing signs of slowing down his growth either! If anything, he had started growing faster than Dotty and Shelly, so how could Frankie still be eating so much?! Nancy had to know the trick.

"Doesn't it take a lot of energy to keep your family so well-fed? How do you find the time to eat even more than before?" she asked.

Frankie chuckled, sending a jiggling wave through her belly, and responded, "Well, Axl and Sue have the instacart password and are old enough to fend for themselves. As for Brick, he's with me almost all of the time but I've actually managed to increase my intake by taking advantage of both of our growing appetites!"

"But how does that work?" Nancy inquired.

"I seem to recall that your trips to Greasy Burger tend to involve several trips to the counter, while Dotty and Shelly tell you exactly what they want and you think about how much you ate last time, and then when Dotty and Shelly finish their share, they realize they're still hungry and make you get up to get them more while you haven't even finished your first portion. Are they still going that way?"

"Yes, they're a real handful, often they even eat my portions while I'm up, and all that walking is soooo tiring" she said with no hint of irony even though she always snags the table closest to the counter.

"Well for example, I know my own and Brick's appetites pretty well, so when we go to Greasy Burger, I listen to his order, then think about how much I think I want, and then order five times all of that. Sometimes one of us really can't finish our portions that way, but I'm always happy to finish his and he's always happy to finish mine. The only time I need to get up a second time is if we want ice cream for dessert, which is often but I can't very well order ten sundaes and let them all melt while we eat our fifty burgers each, right? And he's a smart guy, when his appetite increases he knows to ask for more, so that factor of five has continued to be enough for now!"

"Wow, that's really smart, Frankie. No wonder it looks like Brick's grown so well. Dotty and Shelly’s up to 300 now"--a preposterous weight for a 10-year-old if she had thought about it at all--"how big is your Brick?"

"Well he's gotten excited to weigh in daily recently so as of this morning he was 350 pounds! Kind of surprised he's kept any mobility at his normal 10-year-old height of 4'4". He's got a BMI almost double mine! He'll definitely need a mobility scooter soon, and I'll have to homeschool Him when he reaches middle school age."

Nancy knew she'd be homeschooling Dotty and Shelly too when school started in late August but didn't feel it was worth bringing up. A mobility scooter, though? Her twins, she still insisted to herself even after accepting her own future of fat, was clearly big and strong, she couldn't imagine them losing their mobility no matter how much more they ate.

As for what they did next....
12111111111111111121.title: Sheer gluttony

121111111111111111211.content:
Just then the two superobese mothers heard heavy shuffling towards them. The bedroom door, not fully shut in the first place, was pushed open, and the mothers were greeted by a unified chorus,

"Mommyyyyy, we're hungryyyyy!"

Dotty and Shelly was panting after just this exertion, their faces red and their huge bellies heaving up and down, jiggling a bit with each breath.

At this point, Frankie gave Nancy a "look", which was easily understood as "Ready to try out what you just learned?"

Truth be told, both the kids and moms still hadn't gone more than half an hour since they were stuffing those plates of brownies by the pool, but that was enough time to make room, not to mention the "exertion" of moving their bodies from pool to the bedroom! So Nancy responded,

"Sure, kids, how about we go eat everything we can at Greasy Burger?"

"YAAAAAAY!"

Of course, even getting to the car was an ordeal at this point, especially for Brick. It took another 5 minutes, during which every single one of the porcine quartet needed another tray of brownies for sustenance.

But soon they were on their way, and by the time they were driving into the parking lot, over 1500 pounds crammed into one minivan for "fuel efficiency", all of their tummies were grumbling and ready.

Frankie upped their starting order to 120 double cheeseburgers, 20 jumbo fries, 20 shakes, and two super-sized sodas ("they're free refills and our table is in reaching distance of the machine!"), with the intent of splitting it evenly with Brick. Nancy saw this but knew she and the twins weren't quite up for matching it so she got 100 double cheeseburgers, 10 jumbo fries, and three super-sized sodas for them.

Greasy Burger was used to enormous orders for enormous patrons, so they managed to get all of their food to the table (which was also large enough for the five of them to sit, for now, comfortably on each side, their bellies skillfully hidden by the somewhat-elevated tabletop) at around the same time.

The quinte dug in instantly, to the point that onlookers might think they hadn't eaten in days--and even they felt like they hadn't eaten in hours! Frankie and Brick had clearly gotten this type of gorging down to a science, stuffing each burger into their greedy mouths with as few bites as possible. Dotty, Shelly and Nancy were no slouches, though, the prospect and excitement of 50 burgers in front of them at once causing them to eat at a speed they never had before.

Subconsciously, Nancy was worried about the twin's greed causing them to make some kind of remark, but they had more than enough food for themselves, for now. When they did speak up, around burger 25, Nancy was shocked:

"We like that you're eating like us, mommy.... Now you can get big and strong, too!"

It was at this point that she realized that all of her previous altercations with them weren't because of an intrinsic greed, but because she just didn't understand the true needs of their appetites. When you're hungry, you're just not yourself! She vowed to be a better mom, like Frankie was being to Brick.

The quintet was approaching finishing their order, and....
121111111111111111211.title: The Moms and Kids All Pig Out Together

Brick has to finish the twins's and Frankie has to finish Nancy's
1211111111111111112112.content:
With Frankie and Brick eating faster than the other parent-child trio but also having more on their plates, all five finished at around the same time.

Dotty and Shelly leaned back and was Dotty the first to speak. "Ooh... thanks mommy, I haven't felt this full in a while!" They started rubbing their huge bellies, which were sticking out several inches further than when they first sat down.

"Yeah, I've had enough too mommy, thank you for taking care of me," Brick chimed in, gesturing similarly but being unable to reach the same part of his even larger belly with his arms that were still a few inches shorter than Dotty and Shelly's.

Frankie's stomach actually grumbled in further hunger, and she looked over at Nancy who looked "happy" but not yet "stuffed"--Frankie knew that the best way to gain was to eat until your eyes glaze over. "I'm still a bit hungry, myself... guess my appetite's growing faster than expected, though I don't know why I'm surprised to be able to eat more than a ten year old!"

Nancy thought about it a bit and then got up to order more food alongside Frankie. Even more so than wanting to feel stuffed, she didn't want to fall behind Frankie too much in their gaining journeys!

While they were in line, Frankie yelled over to Brick, "How many sundaes do you want today?" Brick said... "three!"

Nancy was surprised. "I thought she was full? And she had all those milkshakes too...."

"Hahah, the milkshakes we basically drink like water at this point, and when a kid says they're full, it just means they don't want more of what they were just eating. She'll be good on savory food for the next couple hours but that doesn't mean she doesn't want dessert!" Frankie replied. Nancy was beginning to understand how Mary had started growing so much faster than Dotty and Shelly, who originally had her beaten in not just the weight but the BMI department for most of the time they had known each other. Nancy had always taken "full" at face value, but she didn't want Dotty and Shelly to feel left out.... As she saw Dotty and Shelly get up for another refill of their super-sized soda, she knew that Frankie was right, they needed more sweets to be content!

"So how many for you, Dotty and Shelly?"

"We was hoping you'd ask, mommy! We... want the same number as Brick!"

So they have the same competitive streak that I'm having with Frankie, huh, thought Nancy. Although Brick had asked for 3, she knew that meant Frankie would be ordering 15, so she resolved to not leave Dotty and Shelly behind.

Now it was Frankie's turn to order. "Let's see, 10 double cheeseburgers... actually make those all triple bacon cheeseburgers. 5 Jumbo fries. Thirty sundaes... Actually, I'm feeling a bit peckish, make it forty Sundaes, extra fudge on each of course. Oh, and add 10 slices of apple pie!"

"Will that be all ma'am?" The cashier was a fairly fat teenager herself, so while she sounded bored, she wasn't being sarcastic. The total amount Frankie had ordered today was quite large even for Greasy Burger standards, but the food was so addicting that it wasn't entirely beyond the scope of what the teen could imagine eating in her own fat future.

So Frankie cheerfully responded, "For today, I think!" and went back to their table.

Nancy was up. She knew she couldn't match Frankie bite-for-bite yet but she was determined to give it her best. "Ten double bacon cheeseburgers for me, 5 jumbo fries, and thirty sundaes." "Will that be all?" "Yes, thank you." Nancy wasn't quite so used to ordering this much in one sitting so she still felt a little embarrassed.

The food arrived and Frankie once again began mechanically digging in, this time alternating among her savory and sweet foods. Nancy tried to match her pace, her belly starting to feel quite taut after just a couple more burgers and sundaes. Despite the whole five-minute wait for their desserts to arrive, Brick, Dotty and Shelly had slowed down the most, slowly but unwaveringly making it through their sundaes.

As they approached the end of their second gigantic order....
1211111111111111112112.title: The kids get full first, the adults need more

choices: Follow Dotty, Shelly and Nancy's new routines for a while
Fast Forward after a month more of the five fatties' progress
12111111111111111121122.content:
Dotty and Shelly gave up first, 13 sundaes in. They leaned back, gave big, contented sighs, and started patting the top of their decidedly stuffed, round bellies for relief.

Brick, finishing the last bite of his 15th sundae, recognized the signs of true fullness when he saw it, so he reached over, his huge belly pushing like a marshmallow into the table as he leaned, and grabbed their remaining two, starting to slowly spoon them into his mouth.
